locations.name: Mana Pools National Park
locations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site on the Zambezi River, known for walking safaris, canoeing, and abundant wildlife on the floodplains.

locations.name: Lake Kariba
locations.description: Large man-made lake offering dramatic scenery with submerged trees, boat excursions, fishing, and wildlife viewing along the shores.

locations.name: Hwange National Park
locations.description: Zimbabwe's largest game reserve, renowned for its vast elephant herds, predators like lions and wild dogs, and diverse habitats.
